query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Report on participation in international research/innovation conferences - M36
result.description: Report on the attendance of European and world-wide conferences, symposia and meetings will be complemented by an evaluation on whether the concerned activities contribute to the Research Potential increase of the applicants and the necessary measures to be taken in order to preserve the sustainability of the implemented actions or benefits.

result.title: Array of fact sheets
result.description: Array of fact sheets: Five new fact sheets on e.g. biorefinery concepts, aviation biofuels, combined heat and power facilities, hybrid facilities between bioenergy and other renewable energies, marine biofuels, market demand analysis and sustainability aspects of bioenergy. Basically fact sheets will provide a more detailed coverage of a topic as defined in D3.2/D3.3

result.title: Exploitation Plan
result.description: The eHealth Hub Exploitation plan aims to identify and structure the activities that the partners will put in place to maximize the chances of sustainability after the end of the EU funding. It will be based on the project exploitation strategy defined by the partners after interacting with the market, starting at the focus group and survey at the beginning of the project, and continuing during the deployment of services and recruitment activities. The plan will: - Identify the main target customers and beneficiaries from the key stakeholder types. - Produce an exhaustive list of the key exploitable resources (assets) produced during the project lifetime, and how to economically maximize their potential. - Compile the foreseen exploitation activities. - Incorporate activities to increase scalability.

result.title: Final report
result.description: The project will also complete a final report, which will detail the project results and benefits together with the strategy for long-term sustainability. The report will also provide a summary of the actions for the period from 1 May 2016 – 30 April 2017.

result.title: Deployment map
result.description: Adding value to the sustainability strategy will be the deployment map which will focus on integrating the business model into the service. The Deployment Map will illustrate how the service will be implemented and maintained. It will address key issues such as marketing and communicating to the targeted user groups. Further collaborative work and funding will be explored as well as considerations such as cost and quality of curation (input or access point, quality, accessibility and search extraction). The Deployment map will be closely related to the D8.2 and D8.4.
